recipesJson.name: Kawayan
recipesJson.author: RuntDastardly
recipesJson.description:
These three flavors play beautifully together to create a delicately complex, incredibly refreshing shake & vape.

Inhale is juicy, full and sweet, exhale is like spinning a color wheel until it all blurs into some pleasing, blue-green, undiscovered hue.

A little grapefruit zing, some voluptuous lychee sweetness, something vaguely papaya-'nana, whipped up in a blender with a light touch of coconut milk and garnished with an island flower. 

Feel free to add a bit of WS-23 to taste for a frosty summer refresher. Enjoy!

Mixed this up last August and realized I forgot to post it here when I went to re-mix it.

reviews.text: This is a phenomenal fruit mix...great use of some very complex flavors

Wow, I have a hard time describing this. It's fantastic. Usually INW Cactus will be a bully, esp at 1%, but here it just blends in perfectly with the sweetness of the guanabana and zesty citrusy notes from pink guava to end up in a very fresh summertime vape. I tried it without any coolant, but I'll definitley be mixing more of this, feels like a given in this kind of mix. Well done!

It took me way too long to get around to mixing this up. I love the way these ingredients work together, the mouthwatering citrusy pink guava and cactus with that weird but wonderful sort of tart strawberry-pineapple from the Guanabana on top and then the rich, creamy, funky banana-coconut base of the Guanabana with added depth and juiciness from the cactus. Just three ingredients, but so complex and full of flavor.
This is absolutely delicious had to mix another batch. Perfect vape for summer

Stunning, complex and dreamy. This takes me away to a tropical paradise. I know you said "If you don't see any new recipes from me for a long time, you can rest assured I ran out of INW Waffle and died of sorrow" but please come back to the mixing world. We miss you Runt.

Such a lovely combination of flavors. I am a big fan of all of these individually but this mix is greater than the sum of its parts. A delectable and refreshing summertime mix. I love it! Tried both with and without the ice; both are great but ice wears on my lungs a bit so I've got it mixed up again without and am thoroughly enjoying it. Thanks Runt! An easy new ADV for me. Glad you posted it up!
